alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lake; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 2:22PM EDT until April 25 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lake County in northeastern Ohio... East central Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 222 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grafton, or 7 miles southeast of Elyria, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Elyria, Willowick, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, Grafton, Highland Hills, Lakeline, North Olmsted and Garfield Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
